name: Blockade by BubbaJoe
description:
A collection of five very simple and ancient strategy board games where the goal is to blockade your opponent so they cannot move. Play against the computer or with a friend.

Games Included
--------------------
Mū Tōrere
Pong Hau K'i
Grinder
Mlynek
Horseshoe

General Features
----------------------
In single-player mode, there are five difficulty levels. You can lock the difficulty to a specific setting or let it automatically adjust to match your ability. Good luck beating level 5.

In two-player mode, you and a friend play on the same device. Play fair.
